title: For the Kid I Saw in My Dreams
overview: 13 years ago, Nakajou Senri's parents were brutally murdered and his older twin brother Kazuto was taken away by a man with a ‘fire' scar on his arm. Since then, Senri has lived only for revenge. He continues to search for the ‘fire' man. Together with his childhood friend Enan and detective Wakazono, he attempts to track down the truth behind the incident and exact his revenge.
